concept.title: Time Overview
concept.shortdesc: Provides a basic idea about the Time platform service.

section.title: What is Time platform service
section.p: Time platform service starts during device start up. It is responsible for maintaining a queue of all system-wide alarms. It allows clients to query the status of alarms, set alarms, remove alarms and perform other utility functions.

section.title: Need for Time platform service
section.p: Time platform service is required to manage the alarm in the system and system state manager utility plug-in specifically RTC adaptation plug-in.

section.title: For whom does Time platform service matter to?
section.p: Time platform service matters to all the Real time clock and alarm implementations to fulfill the requirements set by the RTC adaptation plug-in interface that is introduced beside of a System State Manager. The SSM Adaptation Server contains a RTC Adaptation plug-in.
